text:
Subject: Urgent: Project Alpha Report

A reminder that the final report for Project Alpha is due this Friday, September 19th, by 5 PM.
Dear students, please complete the given assignment on statistics by tomorrow night, please submit it and mail me if you have any doubts.
Dear students, gentle reminder for the agentic ai course, it will close by tomorrow night.
Please submit your project report by Monday. Let me know if you need clarification.
The project proposal needs to be on my desk by next Tuesday evening.
Please submit your expense reports from the conference by 09/30/2025.
The Q3 performance review is due EOD.
Please prepare the presentation for the client meeting next week.
The documents for the merger need to be signed by noon tomorrow.
Reminder: your quarterly goals must be finalized by the end of this month.
Please provide your feedback on the design mockups by Thursday.
The client demo is scheduled for next Monday at 2 PM.
Please submit your timesheet by end of day Friday.
The code review needs to be done by tomorrow evening.
Please update the project plan by Tuesday morning.
The compliance report is due by September 30th.
Please prepare the Q4 forecast by October 3rd.
The team meeting is scheduled for next Wednesday at 10 AM.
Please complete the online training module by next Friday.
The registration for the workshop closes this Sunday evening.
Please submit your essay for the literature class by tomorrow at 5 PM.
The software update must be completed by next Thursday. Contact support if you face issues.
Reminder: the annual review forms are due by the end of this week.
The budget proposal needs to be finalized by Monday morning.
Please attend the project kickoff meeting on September 20th at 9 AM.
The vendor contract must be signed by next Wednesday.
Please complete the survey for the training session by EOD tomorrow.
The internship application deadline is this Saturday at midnight.
Please review the updated policy document by next Tuesday. Questions? Reach out to HR.
The team outing is scheduled for Friday evening. RSVP by Thursday.

Subject: Login Help

I can't seem to log into the portal. Can you help me with this?
Can you let me know what time the team meeting is?

Subject: Q4 Budget

Hi, I had a question about the budget for Q4. Can we set up a time to chat?
Did we ever get a final date for the project kickoff?
Where can I find the documentation for the new API?
What are the next steps for the Omega project?
Could you please approve my vacation request for next month?
How do I reset my password?
Can you clarify the requirements for the new feature?
Whatâ€™s the status of the vendor contract?

Subject: FYI: Office Maintenance

Please be aware of the planned maintenance this weekend. No action is required.
Weekly sales report is now available for viewing in the dashboard.
The new security policy will take effect on October 1st. Please review the attached PDF.
Thanks for sending that over, I'll take a look.
Your subscription is expiring soon. Please update your payment information.
Just confirming I've received the files. Thanks!
Happy birthday!
The new software release is live. Check it out!
The office will be closed on Monday for the holiday.
The client has approved the final design.
